column4: I'm not sure if you're having the same problem as me, but I have the 64-bit Gutsy and it crashes freezes coming out of sleep mode.
nope, the monitors just go to sleep when usplash start and when gdm comes up they reapear
no one got experience with usplash errors ?
sorry, I misunderstood. I'm not very well versed in Linux, but it may have something to do with the video card or something. I'm really not sure.
